mapper.insert: INSERT ALL INTO HOSPITAL(HOSNO,HOSADDR,HOSNAME,HOSPHONE, HOSLAT, HOSLNG) VALUES(SEQ_JIHUNTEST.NEXTVAL,#{hosaddr},#{hosname},#{hosphone},#{lat},#{lng}) INTO PARTNERS(PID,HOSNO,PEMAIL,HPWD,BUSINESSNUM,REQUEST,ACCEPT,HOSMANAGER,PPHONE) VALUES(#{pid},SEQ_JIHUNTEST.CURRVAL,#{pemail},#{hpwd},#{businessnum},#{request},default,#{hosmanager},#{pphone}) SELECT * FROM DUAL
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PARTNERS WHERE pid=#{pid} AND hpwd = #{hpwd}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PARTNERS WHERE pid= #{pid} AND ACCEPT = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PARTNERS WHERE pid= #{pid} AND ACCEPT = 'D'
SELECT H.HOSNAME,P.PEMAIL,P.INFO,P.LUNCH,P.PERSONALDAY,H.* FROM PARTNERS P JOIN HOSPITAL H ON P.hosno = H.hosno WHERE P.pid = #{pid}
mapper.update: UPDATE PARTNERS SET INFO=#{info},LUNCH=#{lunch} WHERE HOSNO=#{hosno}
UPDATE PARTNERS SET ACCEPT = 'D' WHERE PID = #{pid}
mapper.select: SELECT h.subjectcode,h.hosno,subname FROM HOSSUBJECT H JOIN SUBJECT S ON H.SUBJECTCODE = S.SUBJECTCODE WHERE H.HOSNO = #{hosno}
